huffman.name: Huffman Code Visualizations
huffman.description: Visualize the creation of a Huffman code from character frequencies.

mst.name: Prim's and Kruskals Algorithms for MST
mst.description: side-by-side animations of Prim's and Kruskal's algorithms for building a minimum spanning tree.

tree.name: Comparision of Tree Layout Algorithms
tree.description: Comparisons of different algorithms for drawing trees.

life.name: Conway's Game of Life
life.description: simulation of Conway's Game of Life.

dihedral.name: Dihedral Group - Cayley Table and Octagons
dihedral.description: Visualization of the dihedral group on an octagon (order 16).

symmetric.name: symmetric Group - Cayley Table and Permutations
symmetric.description: Visualization of the symmetric group on 4 elements (order 24).
